page.title: 10METRO
page.content: The{Metro}is part of a unique integrated{transport system}which operates in Tyne & Wear.It carries a million passengers every week and with trains and buses provides a modern transport network.With fast and frequent trains,Metro provides quick and easy access to 41 stations, {Wallsend}being one of these.Wallsend station was refurbished to be functional,practical and designed to complement the local surroundings.The station has an entrance concourse with full information display,ticket machines,entry barriers and exit doors.It is a surface station with covered accommodation for passengers and access ramps for the disabled.Staff are not permanently in attendance.
